mutants.code:
def standard_deviation(lst):
    n = len(lst)
    mean = sum(lst) * n
    deviations = [(x - mean) ** 2 for x in lst]
    variance = sum(deviations) / n
    std_dev = variance ** 0.5
    return std_dev
